js.text: Proficiency with the this context binding in different execution contexts—arrow functions, explicit binding via call, apply, and bind, and the implications for method references in event handlers
Expert-level understanding of Promises, async/await syntax, and their relationship to the JavaScript concurrency model

Ability to identify and prevent memory leaks related to promise retention, understanding how resolved promises can hold references to large objects that prevent garbage collection in certain Node.js scenarios.
Recognition of the performance tradeoffs between async/await and Promise chains when handling HTTP requests or I/O operations, and optimization strategies for each approach
Implementation of proper error propagation through promise chains and async contexts using try-catch blocks and error boundaries.
Advanced DOM querying techniques using querySelector, querySelectorAll, and performance implications of different selection strategies.
Event delegation patterns for efficient handling of dynamic element creation and removal, reducing memory overhead and improving application scalability.
Understanding of event bubbling, event capturing, and proper use of stopPropagation and preventDefault without inadvertently blocking critical browser functionality.
Manipulation of document structure with performance considerations for batch operations using document fragments.
Mastery of array transformation methods—map, reduce, and filter—and composition patterns for building complex data pipelines from reusable functions.

angular.text: Advanced knowledge of RxJS and reactive programming patterns
Experience with Angular routing, lazy loading, and state management
Proficient in Angular testing with Jasmine and Karma
Strong understanding of dependency injection and modular architecture

react.text: Proficient in React hooks and functional components
Experience with React Router and client-side navigation
Knowledge of state management with Context API and Redux
Understanding of React lifecycle and performance optimization
Experience with React testing using Jest and React Testing Library

nextjs.text: Expertise in Next.js server-side rendering and static generation
Experience with API routes and serverless functions
Knowledge of Next.js routing and dynamic routes
Proficient in image optimization and performance tuning
Understanding of deployment strategies on Vercel and other platforms
